channel.title: Attention! Please Read
channel.description:
HELP! every time i log into my server the client listener thing says this: and it doesn't work. I cant play my server... Anyone? I need help! please
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at Class8.method198(Class8.java:41) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:1208) at client.method105(client.java:7942) at client.method36(client.java:1410) at client.method102(client.java:7591) at client.method9(client.java:8526) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4262) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
Please can someone help? Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 04:09:50 pm[/size][hr]Fixed, so never mind!
